/api/v1/host/aliases¶

GET /api/v1/host/aliases/<hostname>¶

Returns a list of IP aliases assigned to the host specified by <hostname>

Example response:

curl -X GET -i https://<domain>:<port>/api/v1/host/aliases/test_server

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 194
Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date: Fri, 26 Aug 2016 10:07:49 GMT
Etag: "bda4f8b8eed1db692dcf4a0f95563544e16ef249"
Server: TornadoServer/4.2

{
        "response": [
                {
                        "aliases": [
                                "dbod-test2.domain",
                                "dbod-test1.domain",
                        ],
                        "host": "test_server"
                }
        ]
}
Query Parameters:
 
  • hostname – server name
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type – application/json
  • Charset – UTF-8
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – no error
  • 404 Not Found – host not registered in the system (or no instances hosted)
